content: as:  Contractual cancellation periods.  Non-recoverable license, support or services costs already committed.  Early termination fees.  Charges to extract our data/IP/solutions from a vendor's platform.  Portability of assets and skills to a new solution. 4.4.5 Other factors Lastly, there might be factors not yet considered by other stakeholders that would fall to the finance team in an organization. For example:  Risks - many risks will already have been addressed by other stakeholders as described in the previous paragraphs in this chapter, but there might be specific ones to be addressed by the Finance function.  Sustainability - how does a new foundation model impact the organization's ESG (environmental, social, and governance) posture? How does it impact our direct and indirect emissions or freshwater usage?  Security - How does the model vendor protect the organization against adversarial attacks, data leaks and other security risks? 52 Ensuring Trustworthy AI with IBM

metadata.title: Ensuring Trustworthy AI with IBM watsonx.governance
